MAIN_MESSAGE: The following information is for customers from the EH42 postcode area of Dunbar. We had no advance warning of the power cut and only became aware of it at 9.18am. Our emergency response team has established that there is an underground cable fault affecting properties in Ruchlaw Main and surrounding areas. Repairing this fault will be complex so we are awaiting delivery of generators to restore power, and this should happen by 4.30pm. Please speak to us if you are aware of any damage to the network or if this information does not apply to you. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.14pm on 26th October 2020.
